title: ConnXus Introduces Transformative Supplier Diversity Management Experience
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/24/2015 @ 11:49 AM Companies mentioned in this article: ConnXus 
MASON, Ohio -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- ConnXus® ( ConnXus.com ) , a leading supplier diversity management software company, is excited to announce a new diverse supplier and corporate buyer management platform. 
"By upgrading to this new platform, suppliers and corporations can engage in new and innovative ways. This all-in-one portal allows enterprise buyers to manage all of their products in a single dashboard. Our web-based platform allows suppliers to better interact with buyers to get maximum exposure to new supplier chain opportunities," says ConnXus COO Daryl Hammett. 
The upgraded ConnXus platform fully reflects the company's motto: Supplier Diversity Made Simple®. 
"Our full solution suite is wrapped in multiple layers of security and is delivered reliably by a new redundant, high-performance infrastructure to ensure access to your tools and data when you need them. Users will experience a first-of-its kind web application that easily works existing management system through the ConnXus API," says Sr. Manager of Technology Solutions Tyler Johnson. 
Our cloud-based suite can be accessed from any internet-connected device with a web browser; smart-phone, tablet and PC. Utilize the power of your dashboard from your Apple or Android device. 
Solutions include: Scrub: Identify and validate diverse suppliers in your company's existing supplier database Supplier Registration Portal: Collect, search and filter key diverse vendor information in a private, branded repository TierTracker® : Captures direct and indirect (Tier 1 and Tier 2) spend with customized reports in a single repository ConnXus Database: Access a database of more than 1.7 million diverse suppliers 
User-Friendly Dashboard 
Our simple, clean and user-friendly dashboard design equips clients with the confidence to manage their dashboard independently. Users are empowered with the ability to control all aspects of their portal and supplier data. Tutorial information is accessible from any page in the application. 
For clients who want extra support, the ConnXus concierge option is available. 
Featured Product Enhancements 
The ConnXus platform is scalable, which ensures consistent performance, regardless of number of suppliers in the system. Better designed supplier registration, supplier management and spend reporting software solutions reflect feedback from clients. 
A sleek interface allows you to report data and spend in as few clicks and keystrokes as possible. 
Multiple Layers of Data Security 
From its inception our new platform was designed with multiple layers of security at network, application, and storage levels to keep your sensitive data secure. Your data is encrypted in transit and at rest on dedicated hardware in multiple availability zones across the continental United States using the latest encryption algorithms. 
You can define your own permission groups and assign users to control access to your company, products and data. We have also empowered users to generate dynamic audit log reports at the click of a button to see the "who, what, and when" information about changes to your data and user events. 
Go to ConnXus.com , and register for a supplier membership, or sign up for a free product demo today. ConnXus staff will also demo supplier and buyer products at the upcoming NMSDC Conference and Business Opportunity Fair starting Oct. 18 in San Diego. 
About ConnXus 
Headquartered in Mason, Ohio, ConnXus helps grow diverse woman- and minority-owned businesses by connecting them to Fortune 2000 corporations seeking a competitive edge through Supplier Diversity. Our cloud-based supplier relationship management platform enables major corporations to better manage all aspects of their Supplier Diversity compliance and programs. ConnXus is a Software as a Service provider, and an NMSDC-certified African-American owned company.
